dcterms:creator: Istiak Ahmad
Fahad AlQurashi
Rashid Mehmood
dcterms:description: Potrika is the largest and most extensive dataset for news classification in the Bangla language, comprising 185.51 million words and 12.57 million sentences contained in 664,880 news articles in eight distinct categories, curated from six popular online news portals in Bangladesh for the period 2014-2020.
dcterms:title: Potrika

dcterms:creator: Asif Hassan
Mohammad Rashedul Amin
N Mohammed
AKA Azad
dcterms:description: The BRBT dataset is used for sentiment analysis on Bangla and romanized Bangla text using deep recurrent models.
dcterms:title: 10k Bangla and romanized Bangla text (BRBT) dataset

dcterms:creator: Md Tanvir Alam
Md Moﬁjul Islam
dcterms:description: The Bengali news articles dataset contains about 350K articles in five categories (State, Economy, International, Entertainment, and Sports) and is used for Bangla article classification.
dcterms:title: Bengali news articles dataset

dcterms:creator: Md Tanvir Alam
Md Moﬁjul Islam
dcterms:description: The 350K articles dataset is used for Bangla article classification and contains a comprehensive collection of articles.
dcterms:title: 350K articles dataset

dcterms:creator: Ankita Dhar
Niladri Sekhar Dash
Kaushik Roy
dcterms:description: The 1960 Bangla text documents dataset is used for categorizing documents of an online Bangla web text corpus using TF-IDF features.
dcterms:title: 1960 Bangla text documents dataset

dcterms:creator: Pritom Mojumder
Mahmudul Hasan
Md Faruque Hossain
KM Azharul Hasan
dcterms:description: The 40 thousand news samples dataset is used for document classification in the Bangla language.
dcterms:title: 40 thousand news samples dataset

dcterms:creator: Kazi Masudul Alam
Md Tanvir Hossain Hemel
SM Muhaiminul Islam
Aysha Akther
dcterms:description: The 70k Bangla news articles dataset is used for Bangla news trend observation using LDA based topic modeling.
dcterms:title: 70k Bangla news articles dataset

dcterms:creator: Istiak Ahmad
Fahad AlQurashi
Rashid Mehmood
dcterms:description: The 120K articles dataset is part of the Potrika dataset and is used for text classification.
dcterms:title: 120K articles dataset
